item.content:encoded:
1. Disable Internet connection.
  2. Make sure you do not have any of the following entries in your hosts file. 127.0.0.1 lmlicenses.wip4.adobe.com
    127.0.0.1 lm.licenses.adobe.com
  3. Install Adobe Premiere Pro. [Follow the Images in Installation Screenshots folder]
  4. After Installation. Launch Premiere Pro as Trial. [Its Important]
  5. Close Premiere Pro.
  6. Copy the file “amtlib.dll” from Crack folder to Installation directory. [C:\Program Files\Adobe\Adobe Premiere Pro CC 2015]
  7. Block the program in your firewall and add the following lines to your hosts file.

127.0.0.1 lmlicenses.wip4.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 lm.licenses.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 na1r.services.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 hlrcv.stage.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 practivate.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 activate.adobe.com

  1. Run the program & Enjoyâ€¦!!!

NOTE: Hosts file is located in C:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc\
